item.title: Assignmnet A04: Shiny App
item.description: Covid analysis This work provides some comparion of number of covid death based on state, age group, and place of death of the 02/01/2020 and 07/23/2020 as of 07/23/2020. Please find the data visualization on the following shiny app. In the Covid death tab, you first choose the state, and then the plot will show the number of all death involving Covid-19 based on different age gruops.The age groups are 0-14, 15-44, 45-64, 65-74, 75-84, 85 years and over, and all ages.

item.title: Data and Visualization
